DOC.brief_title: Minimally Invasive Interval Debulking Surgery in Ovarian Neoplasm: a Feasibility Study
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of this prospective Phase II multicentric study is to assess feasibility and early complications rate of "total laparoscopic/robotic" interval debulking surgery in patients with a clinical complete/partial response to neoadjuvant chemotherapy for advanced ovarian cancer.
